actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit individuals to return congressional questionnaires, and to mail Federal income tax returns, free of postage.

summary.text: Permits postage-free mailing of answers to congressional questionnaires and personal income tax returns. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3406; 3407)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit individuals to return congressional questionnaires, and to mail Federal income tax returns, free of postage.
